original_text: The Philistine commanders continued to go out to battle, and as often as they did, David met with more success than the rest of Saul’s officers, and his name became well known.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들의 방백들이 싸우러 나오면 그들이 나올 때마다 다윗이 사울의 모든 신하보다 더 지혜롭게 행하매 이에 그의 이름이 심히 귀하게 되니라

sentences.original_text: The Philistine commanders continued to go out to battle
and as often as they did
than the rest of Saul's officers
and his name became well known
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 이름은 잘 알려지게 되었습니다
